title: The Power of Wi-Fi 6 Is Here—But Do You Really Need It?
sub_head: With more devices populating homes, updating to a Wi-Fi 6 router could help improve everyone’s internet experience. That said, they don’t come cheap.
body:
Have you noticed that the collective demands of Zoom calls, Netflix streaming and your kids’ remote learning have slowed your once-zippy network to a crawl? While the dog is thrilled everyone’s home all the time, your router is not. To regain performance, some experts recommend upgrading to Wi-Fi 6, the latest generation of wireless internet, care of one of the new batch of routers (see below).
